column4: can't login  using ubuntu after an upgrade to 11.10 : saned disabled edit /etc/default/saned ... and checking battery statut !  I tried to reinstall ati driver from the recovery but always I'm getting the same problem
do you get a graphical login at least?
: no I don't ! it's blocked before the graphical login
have a look at /var/run, and /var/lock, they are now symlinks to /run and /run/lock
